talks.speaker: Blake Shakespeare
talks.title: Moving your React site to SvelteKit
talks.abstract: Learn from my experience in transitioning my site from React to SvelteKit: what I got right, what I would do differently going forward.

talks.speaker: River Costa
talks.title: Building out a GraphQL API in Svelte using Prisma and Supabase
talks.abstract: See just how easy it can be to write an API using a modern framework and tooling.  I take you through step by step from pnpm init to production ready product. The future is SvelteKit!
